settings.name: ns_account
settings.label: NetSuite Account
settings.description: Your account Id. This can be found under Setup -> Company -> Company Information. Look for Account Id. Note "_SB" is for Sandbox account.

settings.name: ns_consumer_key
settings.label: NetSuite Consumer Key
settings.description: Your consumer key for token based authentication consumer key for SOAP connection. Visit the https://support.cazoomi.com/hc/en-us/articles/360010093392-How-to-Setup-NetSuite-Token-Based-Authentication-as-Authentication-Type for details.

settings.name: ns_consumer_secret
settings.label: NetSuite Consumer Secret
settings.description: Your consumer secret for token based authentication consumer key for SOAP connection. Visit the https://support.cazoomi.com/hc/en-us/articles/360010093392-How-to-Setup-NetSuite-Token-Based-Authentication-as-Authentication-Type for details.

settings.name: ns_token_key
settings.label: NetSuite Token Key
settings.description: Your token key for token based authentication consumer key for SOAP connection. Visit the https://support.cazoomi.com/hc/en-us/articles/360010093392-How-to-Setup-NetSuite-Token-Based-Authentication-as-Authentication-Type for details.

settings.name: ns_token_secret
settings.label: NetSuite Token Secret
settings.description: Your token secret for token based authentication consumer key for SOAP connection. Visit the https://support.cazoomi.com/hc/en-us/articles/360010093392-How-to-Setup-NetSuite-Token-Based-Authentication-as-Authentication-Type for details.

settings.name: select_fields_by_default
settings.label: Select Fields By Default
settings.description: When new fields are discovered in NetSuite objects, the select_fields_by_default key describes whether or not the tap will select those fields by default.

settings.name: is_sandbox
settings.label: Is Sandbox
settings.description: The is_sandbox should always be set to "true" if you are connecting Production account of NetSuite. Set it to false if you want to connect to SandBox acccount.

settings.name: start_date
settings.label: Start Date
settings.description: Determines how much historical data will be extracted. Please be aware that the larger the time period and amount of data, the longer the initial extraction can be expected to take.
